Privacy Policy

Effective Date: March 23, 2025.

1. Introduction

Welcome to khbbsmelding.com ("we," "our," or "us"). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit https://khbbsmelding.com/.

By using this website, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

2. Information We Collect

We do not collect personal information unless you voluntarily provide it (e.g., via a contact form). However, we may automatically collect:

  • Cookies & Tracking Data: Used to enhance user experience and display relevant ads.
  • Google AdSense & Analytics Data: We use third-party services to analyze traffic and show ads.

3. How We Use Your Information

We use collected data to:

  • Improve website functionality & user experience.
  • Display relevant ads (Google AdSense, if applicable).
  • Monitor site performance (Google Analytics).

4. Third-Party Services

We use third-party advertising & analytics tools, including:

  • Google AdSense: Displays ads based on browsing activity.
  • Google Analytics: Tracks website traffic trends.

These services may use cookies and collect anonymous data.

5. Requesting Your Data or Deletion

Because this website does not collect personal login data, we do not store personally identifiable information. However, third-party services like Google Analytics and Google AdSense may collect anonymous browsing data.

If you would like to access or delete data related to Google services, you can do so using the following tools:

  • Google My Ad Center: Manage ad preferences and review personalized ads here.
  • Google Analytics Data Export: If you would like an anonymized overview of site interactions linked to your IP address, you may contact us at contact@khbbsmelding.com.

Additionally, you can manage cookies and tracking preferences by adjusting your browser settings.

6. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The latest version will always be available at https://khbbsmelding.com/.

7. Contact Us

If you have questions about this policy, contact us at: contact@khbbsmelding.com
